QuestData.Title: Breaking the Code
QuestData.Description: I think I can formulate an elixir that will allow us to more readily decipher the glyphs and language of the silithid and Qiraji! $B$BWhat do I need? Glad you asked! I need brains!$B$BNormally I'd need a brain from each silithid type that inhabit the hives. Another brave explorer brought me two of 'em here... and never came back from Hive'Regal.$B$BBring me back a silithid brain from Hive'Regal... and be careful not to end up like him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain an intact Hive'Regal Silithid Brain from any silithid in Hive'Regal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Go play with the monkey, kid. I don't have time for this.
QuestData.RewardText: Outstanding! Don't wander off too far, kid. We might need you to take on another task or two.
